text: Danute "Bunki" Bankaitis-Davis (January 2, 1958 â€“ January 29, 2021) was an American road racing cyclist. She won a gold medal at the 1992 UCI Road World Championships in the team time trial. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics in the women's road race finishing 14th. Bankaitis-Davis died on January 29, 2021 at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for the United States Category:American cyclists
title: Bunki Bankaitis-Davis
